name: Slider.Root
description: A control element that allows for a range of selections.
description_zh: A control element that allows for a range of selections.

aria-label.description: The aria-label of each slider thumb. Useful for providing an accessible name to the slider
aria-label.description_zh: 每个滑块滑块的 aria-label。用于为滑块提供辅助名称

aria-labelledby.description: The `id` of the elements that labels each slider thumb. Useful for providing an accessible name to the slider
aria-labelledby.description_zh: 标记每个滑块滑块的元素的 'id'。用于为滑块提供辅助名称

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the slider when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the slider.
defaultValue.description_zh:
首次渲染滑块时的初始值。
在不需要控制滑块的状态时使用。

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.
form.description_zh: 基础 input 元素的 associate 形式。

getAriaValueText.description: Function that returns a human readable value for the slider thumb
getAriaValueText.description_zh: 返回滑块滑块的可读值的函数

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  thumb(index: number): string
  hiddenInput(index: number): string
  control: string
  track: string
  range: string
  label: string
  valueText: string
  marker(index: number): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the range slider. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 范围滑块中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

max.description: The maximum value of the slider

min.description: The minimum value of the slider

minStepsBetweenThumbs.description: The minimum permitted steps between multiple thumbs.
minStepsBetweenThumbs.description_zh: 多个缩略图之间允许的最小步数。

name.description: The name associated with each slider thumb (when used in a form)
name.description_zh: 与每个滑块块关联的名称（在表单中使用时）

origin.description:
The origin of the slider range
- "start": Useful when the value represents an absolute value
- "center": Useful when the value represents an offset (relative)
origin.description_zh:
滑块范围的原点
- “start”：当值表示绝对值时很有用
- “center”：当值表示偏移量（相对）时很有用

step.description: The step value of the slider

thumbAlignment.description:
The alignment of the slider thumb relative to the track
- `center`: the thumb will extend beyond the bounds of the slider track.
- `contain`: the thumb will be contained within the bounds of the track.
thumbAlignment.description_zh:
滑块滑块相对于轨道的对齐方式
- 'center'：拇指将延伸到滑轨的边界之外。
- 'contain'：Thumb 将包含在轨道的边界内。

events.name: focusChange
events.description: Function invoked when the slider's focused index changes
events.description_zh: 当滑块的焦点索引更改时调用的函数

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Function invoked when the value of the slider changes
events.description_zh: 当滑块的值发生变化时调用的函数

events.name: valueChangeEnd
events.description: Function invoked when the slider value change is done
events.description_zh: 完成滑块值更改时调用的函数
